Connecting Via WIFI interface:

Common:
  # Mesh router re-routes all client web requests to configuration page on own internal web server
  # When client tries to surf s/he is presented with a series of steps:
    # Specify WIFI IP                               (default: 10.x.x.x)
    # Specify B.A.T.M.A.N. Vis server  (default: 10.0.0.2)
    # Specify B.A.T.M.A.N. routing_class (default: 3)
    # Router reconfigures
    # (Optional) Position router on map or via entering Lon/Lat
    # (Optional) Enter personal information
    # Reboot
  # Router disables web redirection
  # Router reboots
